column4: Hi, I want to setup a LAN, but what do I do after changing IP-adresses? I want to be able to drag-n-drop etc...
I have one Ubuntu comp and one Xubuntu.
you are a little vague  in what you are trying to do..
I'm perfectly clear. I want to be able to drag and drop stuff from one computer to another...
but I don't want to access a windows share
I want to transfer stuff from a Xubuntu comp to an Ubuntu one
the gnome file manager has a samba browser/feature I recall
I perfer to mount my samba shares using smb4k
actually taht FuseSambaFS or FuseSSH stuff is handy as well
